comma.description: Control whether commas should be inserted inside a list of items.

oneOf.description: Insert commas inside a list of items. For single line list, there won't be trailing comma; for multiple lines list, there will be trailing comma.
Do not insert commas inside a list of items. All existed commas will be removed.
Insert commas inside a list of items without trailing comma.
Insert commas inside a list of items only for single line list. For multiple lines list, there won't be commas.

singleLine.description: Control whether items should be placed on single line as possible, even they're originally on multiple lines, or force them to be on multiple lines.

oneOf.description: Place items on single line as possible.
Whether items should be placed on single line will be determined by original layout.
Force items to be on multiple lines.

printWidth.description: The line width limitation that Pretty GraphQL should *(but not must)* avoid exceeding. Pretty GraphQL will try its best to keep line width less than this value, but it may exceed for some cases, for example, a very very long single word.

useTabs.description: Specify use space or tab for indentation.

indentWidth.description: Size of indentation. When enabled `useTabs`, this option may be disregarded, since only one tab will be inserted when indented once.

lineBreak.description: Specify whether use `\n` (LF) or `\r\n` (CRLF) for line break.

parenSpacing.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted between parentheses or not.

arguments.parenSpacing.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted between parentheses or not.

variableDefinitions.parenSpacing.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted between parentheses or not.

bracketSpacing.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted between brackets or not.

braceSpacing.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted between braces or not.

enumValuesDefinition.braceSpacing.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted between braces or not.

formatComments.description: Control whether whitespace should be inserted at the beginning of comments or not.

ignoreCommentDirective.description: Text directive for ignoring formatting specific content.
